author: COMSOL
description: This example shows how you can approximate a structure outside the modeling domain by connecting it to the model as a circuit equivalent. A 3D model of a coaxial cable is connected to a voltage source in series with a matched impedance. In addition, the coax sees a load, also of matched impedance.
label: coaxial_cable_circuit.mph
